name: nother
content:
a whole 'nother story/thing/ballgame/issue, etc.
Add to word list
Add to word list
used for referring to a completely different situation, often one that is difficult or that you know little about: I've parachuted and bungee jumped but rock climbing is a whole 'nother thing. I didn't mind being called an idiot, but when it comes to attacking my family, that's a whole 'nother ballgame. When you're dealing with children, that's a whole nother issue. He didn't come home last night, but that’s a whole 'nother story. That's a topic for a whole nother post.
